channel.title: Do not watch this video
channel.description:
Do not, under any circumstances, watch [url=http://forum.uncoverreality.com/audio-video/52789-murderers-brutally-kill-man-camera-beware-sickest-thing-you-will-ever-see.html]this video[/url]. If you watched you would be disobeying me.
If you do in fact disobey me, do not skip to 1:55 in the video. If you skipped to 1:55 you will see why you shouldn't watch [url=http://forum.uncoverreality.com/audio-video/52789-murderers-brutally-kill-man-camera-beware-sickest-thing-you-will-ever-see.html]this video[/url].

item.title: Do not watch this video
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Meh…

It’s no different to me then watching a fake horror movie with a lot of gore. I’m completely desensitized to this stuff.

4chan corrupted my mind I think this can benefit a person in a way though, it’s like having a very strong mind/stomach lol. The fewer things to disturb me, the better

item.title: Do not watch this video
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

For one, it’s impossible to learn that the media is fake, via the media. All I did was saying that the media is wrong about China being a communist country. Communism means equality, but China has a dictator so it isn’t communism.

And about Peta: please don’t get involved with these guys. Sure, I find it disgusting that people do such shit to animals, but Peta takes it too far. The EU just recently passed a bill that made it illegal to import coats that contain dog fur. This is something I applaud. Killing dogs for their fur is bad. But I don’t think other fur coats should be prohibited. Leather for example is a beautiful material, and it only stimulates to use the complete dead cow instead of parts of it and throwing the rest away.

Oh, and to fill up: I didn’t even watch this video as I find it too sick. Torture shouldn’t be allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Do not watch this video
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:1, topic:255242”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=337253.msg2619148#msg2619148 date=1231263307]

Peta probably says that every bear in China gets skinned that way.

I’m sure most do, and even if it is a few. It’s a few too many.

Where do you base that on? Just because the media makes you believe that China is a communist country, doesn’t mean that they are barbarians.
[/quote]
You’re twisting everything that I said to make it look like I said Chinese are barbarians and that I think comunism is wrong. I am basing what I said on what I saw happening to a few poor helpless little bears, get slammed against the ground, then getting cut open and get their skin pulled off alive. You then see one breathing, moving, bleeding while droplets form under what is left of its eyes. Surely that is enough to make your stomach feel faint, if it isn’t you have no heart.[/quote]

I made that post because I was almost 100% sure you wouldn’t be that ignorant to base your opinion on one video posted on a website owned by idiots. But I was wrong.

Read full topic
